verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> was the feast of the passover, <S%G3957><s%> and of unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread: and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might take <S%G2902><s%> him by craft, <S%G1388><s%> and put <S%G615><s%> him to death. <S%G615><s%>
But they said, <S%G3004><s%> Not on <S%G1722><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> day, lest <S%G3379><s%> there be an uproar <S%G2351><s%> of the people. <S%G2992><s%>

And being <S%G5607><s%> in Bethany <S%G963><s%> in the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> the leper, <S%G3015><s%> as he sat <S%G2621><s%> at <S%G2621><s%> meat, there came <S%G2064><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> an alabaster <S%G211><s%> box <S%G211><s%> of ointment <S%G3464><s%> of spikenard <S%G3487><s%> <S%G4101><s%> very <S%G4185><s%> precious; <S%G4185><s%> and she broke <S%G4937><s%> the box, <S%G211><s%> and poured <S%G2708><s%> it on <S%G2596><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

And there were some <S%G5100><s%> that had indignation <S%G23><s%> within <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> was this <S%G3778><s%> waste <S%G684><s%> of the ointment <S%G3464><s%> made? <S%G1096><s%>

For it might <S%G1410><s%> have been sold <S%G4097><s%> for more <S%G1883><s%> than <S%G1883><s%> three <S%G5145><s%> hundred <S%G5145><s%> pence, <S%G1220><s%> and have been given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%> And they murmured <S%G1690><s%> against <S%G1690><s%> her.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Let <S%G863><s%> her alone; <S%G863><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> trouble <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> you her? she has worked <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> me.

For you have <S%G2192><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> with you always, <S%G3842><s%> and whenever <S%G3752><s%> you will <S%G2309><s%> you may <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> them good: <S%G2095><s%> but me you have <S%G2192><s%> not always. <S%G3842><s%>
She has done <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> she could: <S%G2192><s%> she is come <S%G4301><s%> beforehand <S%G4301><s%> to anoint <S%G3462><s%> my body <S%G4983><s%> to the burying. <S%G1780><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> shall be preached <S%G2784><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> this also <S%G2532><s%> that she has done <S%G4160><s%> shall be spoken <S%G2980><s%> of for a memorial <S%G3422><s%> of her.
And Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> went <S%G565><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> him to them.

And when they heard <S%G191><s%> it, they were glad, <S%G5463><s%> and promised <S%G1861><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him money. <S%G694><s%> And he sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he might conveniently <S%G2122><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> him.

And the first <S%G4413><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread, when <S%G3753><s%> they killed <S%G2380><s%> the passover, <S%G3957><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Where <S%G4226><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you that we go <S%G565><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> that you may eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover? <S%G3957><s%>

And he sends <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Go <S%G5217><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and there shall meet <S%G528><s%> you a man <S%G444><s%> bearing <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water: <S%G5204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him.

And wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> he shall go <S%G1525><s%> in, say <S%G2036><s%> you to the manager <S%G3611><s%> of the house, <S%G3617><s%> The Master <S%G1320><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> is the guest room, <S%G2646><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I shall eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> with my disciples? <S%G3101><s%>

And he will show <S%G1166><s%> you a large <S%G3173><s%> upper <S%G508><s%> room <S%G508><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> and prepared: <S%G2092><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> make <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> for us.

And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> as he had said <S%G2036><s%> to them: and they made <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> the passover. <S%G3957><s%>
And in the evening <S%G3798><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> with the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And as they sat <S%G345><s%> and did eat, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, One <S%G1520><s%> of you which <S%G3588><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> with me shall betray <S%G3860><s%> me.
And they began <S%G756><s%> to be sorrowful, <S%G3076><s%> and to say <S%G3004><s%> to him one <S%G1520><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> Is it I? and another <S%G243><s%> said, Is it I?
And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, It is one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> that dips <S%G1686><s%> with me in the dish. <S%G5165><s%>

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> goes, <S%G5217><s%> as it is written <S%G1125><s%> of him: but woe <S%G3759><s%> to that man <S%G444><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> were it for that man <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he had never <S%G3756><s%> been born. <S%G1080><s%>

And as they did eat, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and blessed, <S%G2127><s%> and broke <S%G2806><s%> it, and gave <S%G1325><s%> to them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> Take, <S%G2983><s%> eat: <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is my body. <S%G4983><s%>
And he took <S%G2983><s%> the cup, <S%G4221><s%> and when he had given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> it to them: and they all <S%G3956><s%> drank <S%G4095><s%> of it.
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, This <S%G5124><s%> is my blood <S%G129><s%> of the new <S%G2537><s%> testament, <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is shed <S%G1632><s%> for many. <S%G4183><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I will drink <S%G4095><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> of the fruit <S%G1081><s%> of the vine, <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> that day <S%G2250><s%> that I drink <S%G4095><s%> it new <S%G2537><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when they had sung <S%G5214><s%> an hymn, they went <S%G1831><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, All <S%G3956><s%> you shall be offended <S%G4624><s%> because <S%G1722><s%> of me this <S%G5026><s%> night: <S%G3571><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> I will smite <S%G3960><s%> the shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> shall be scattered. <S%G1287><s%>
But after <S%G3326><s%> that I am risen, <S%G1453><s%> I will go <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>
But Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, Although <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> shall be offended, <S%G4624><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> will not I.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That this <S%G4594><s%> day, <S%G4594><s%> even in this <S%G5026><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crow <S%G5455><s%> twice, <S%G1364><s%> you shall deny <S%G533><s%> me thrice. <S%G5151><s%>

But he spoke <S%G3004><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> vehemently, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4053><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I should <S%G1163><s%> die <S%G4880><s%> with you, I will not deny <S%G533><s%> you in any <S%G3364><s%> wise. Likewise <S%G5615><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they all. <S%G3956><s%>

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to a place <S%G5564><s%> which was named <S%G3686><s%> Gethsemane: <S%G1068><s%> and he said <S%G3004><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Sit <S%G2523><s%> you here, <S%G5602><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> I shall pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And he takes <S%G3880><s%> with him Peter <S%G4074><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to be sore <S%G1568><s%> amazed, <S%G1568><s%> and to be very <S%G85><s%> heavy; <S%G85><s%>
And said <S%G3004><s%> to them, My soul <S%G5590><s%> is exceeding <S%G4036><s%> sorrowful <S%G4036><s%> to death: <S%G2288><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> you here, <S%G5602><s%> and watch. <S%G1127><s%>

And he went <S%G4281><s%> forward <S%G4281><s%> a little, <S%G3397><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground, <S%G1093><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> that, if <S%G1487><s%> it were possible, <S%G1415><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> might pass <S%G3928><s%> from him.

And he said, <S%G3004><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are possible <S%G1415><s%> to you; take <S%G3911><s%> away <S%G3911><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> from me: nevertheless <S%G235><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> I will, <S%G2309><s%> but what <S%G5101><s%> you will. <S%G2309><s%>

And he comes, <S%G2064><s%> and finds <S%G2147><s%> them sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> sleep <S%G2518><s%> you? could <S%G2480><s%> not you watch <S%G1127><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> hour? <S%G5610><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> you and pray, <S%G4336><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%> The spirit <S%G4151><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is ready, <S%G4289><s%> but the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is weak. <S%G772><s%>
And again <S%G3825><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> away, <S%G565><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%> and spoke <S%G2036><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>

And when he returned, <S%G5290><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> them asleep <S%G2518><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> (for their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were heavy, <S%G916><s%>) neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> they what <S%G5101><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> him.

And he comes <S%G2064><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Sleep <S%G2518><s%> on now, <S%G3063><s%> and take your rest: <S%G373><s%> it is enough, <S%G566><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> is come; <S%G2064><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed <S%G3860><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of sinners. <S%G268><s%>
Rise <S%G1453><s%> up, let us go; <S%G71><s%> see, <S%G2400><s%> he that betrays <S%G3860><s%> me is at <S%G1448><s%> hand. <S%G1448><s%>

And immediately, <S%G2112><s%> while he yet <S%G2089><s%> spoke, <S%G2980><s%> comes <S%G3854><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> and with him a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> with swords <S%G3162><s%> and staves, <S%G3586><s%> from the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the elders. <S%G4245><s%>

And he that betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him had given <S%G1325><s%> them a token, <S%G4953><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I shall kiss, <S%G5368><s%> that same <S%G846><s%> is he; take <S%G2902><s%> him, and lead <S%G520><s%> him away <S%G520><s%> safely. <S%G806><s%>
And as soon as he was come, <S%G2064><s%> he goes <S%G4334><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> to him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G4461><s%> master; <S%G4461><s%> and kissed <S%G2705><s%> him.
And they laid <S%G1911><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him, and took <S%G2902><s%> him.

And one <S%G1520><s%> of them that stood <S%G3936><s%> by drew <S%G4685><s%> a sword, <S%G3162><s%> and smote <S%G3817><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and cut <S%G851><s%> off <S%G609><s%> his ear. <S%G5621><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Are you come <S%G1831><s%> out, as against <S%G1909><s%> a thief, <S%G3027><s%> with swords <S%G3162><s%> and with staves <S%G3586><s%> to take <S%G4815><s%> me?

I was daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> with you in the temple <S%G2411><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and you took <S%G2902><s%> me not: but the scriptures <S%G1124><s%> must <S%G2443><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>
And they all <S%G3956><s%> forsook <S%G863><s%> him, and fled. <S%G5343><s%>

And there followed <S%G190><s%> him a certain <S%G5100><s%> young <S%G3495><s%> man, <S%G3495><s%> having a linen <S%G4616><s%> cloth <S%G4616><s%> cast <S%G4016><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> his naked <S%G1131><s%> body; <S%G4983><s%> and the young <S%G3495><s%> men <S%G3495><s%> laid hold <S%G2902><s%> on him:
And he left <S%G2641><s%> the linen <S%G4616><s%> cloth, <S%G4616><s%> and fled <S%G5343><s%> from them naked. <S%G1131><s%>

And they led <S%G520><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> away <S%G520><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest: <S%G749><s%> and with him were assembled <S%G4905><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the elders <S%G4245><s%> and the scribes. <S%G1122><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him afar <S%G3113><s%> off, <S%G575><s%> even <S%G2193><s%> into <S%G2080><s%> <S%G1519><s%> the palace <S%G833><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest: <S%G749><s%> and he sat <S%G4775><s%> with the servants, <S%G5257><s%> and warmed <S%G2328><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the fire. <S%G5457><s%>

And the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and all <S%G3650><s%> the council <S%G4892><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> for witness <S%G3141><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to put <S%G2289><s%> him to death; <S%G2289><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>
For many <S%G4183><s%> bore <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness <S%G5576><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him, but their witness <S%G3141><s%> agreed <S%G2470><s%> not together.
And there arose <S%G450><s%> certain, <S%G5100><s%> and bore <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness <S%G5576><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

We heard <S%G191><s%> him say, <S%G3004><s%> I will destroy <S%G2647><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%> that is made <S%G5499><s%> with hands, <S%G5499><s%> and within <S%G1223><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> another <S%G243><s%> made <S%G886><s%> without <S%G886><s%> hands. <S%G886><s%>
But neither <S%G3761><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> did their witness <S%G3141><s%> agree <S%G2470><s%> together.

And the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up in the middle, <S%G3319><s%> and asked <S%G1905><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Answer <S%G611><s%> you nothing? <S%G3762><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is it which these <S%G3778><s%> witness <S%G2649><s%> against you?
